football stars bond conditions modified after two violations

Stop Lubbocks abortion travel ban

Smile you are on camera lawbreaker

Celebrating National Cat Day

A Swifties analysis of  Taylors Version

This weekend at the box office despite the release of Scream  animated films dominated the box office PERIOD Rio the new animated films about birds in Brazil with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway came in at  million for the weekend easily topping Scream 4s  million PERIOD

The previous number one film Hop came in at number three still holding strong despite competition PERIOD Two of the top three films this weekend ended up being animated showing that animated family films continue to be solid gold at the box office PERIOD

According to the box office receipt measuring website Box Office Mojo half of the top ten animated films from the past year were animated PERIOD Toy Story  Despicable Me Shrek Forever After How to Train your Dragon and Tangled all reached around the  million dollar mark PERIOD Tangled is the only one that fell short finishing at  million which is still pretty close. with the lackluster offerings Hollywood usually rolls out these days you would think movie studios would get smart and have the people behind the recent influx of quality animated films get their hands on more adult projects PERIOD Disney seems to be on the right track consulting Pixar for Tron Legacy PERIOD Maybe in coming years other studios will follow suit PERIOD



Independent Student Newspaper for the University of Texas at San Antonio
title: Animation domination - The Paisano
name: University of Texas San Antonio
